inclusion.criterion: Cirrhosis defined by any one of the following
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unclear diagnosis of cirrhosis (does not meet the criteria outlined above)
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient has a clear diagnosis of Parkinson's disease and is complaining of slowness of movement and tremors. However, he does not meet the criteria for cirrhosis or have any prior overt HE episodes.
